QuestData.Title: Learning Is Painful
QuestData.Description: The academy is up and running, in a secret location of course. Maybe it doesn't exist at all?$B$BBy the by, I appear to be running quite dry on sharp, pointy instruments of education.$B$B<Lonika winks at you several times before nudging you sharply in the ribs with her dagger.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Huge Crate of Weapons in Grimrail Depot.
